The following genes are retained: 

```{python}
# adata.raw = adata_binary
```

```{python}
markers_ensg = markers_ensg.loc[markers_ensg["ensg"].isin(adata.raw.var_names), :]
display(markers_ensg, n=100)
```

```{python}
cell_types = markers_ensg["cell_type"].unique()
```

```{python}
for ct in cell_types:
    ct_markers = markers_ensg.loc[markers_ensg["cell_type"] == ct, ["ensg", "gene_symbol"]].drop_duplicates()
    markers = ct_markers["ensg"].values
    symbols = ct_markers["gene_symbol"].values
    title = ["{}: {}".format(ct, m) for m in symbols]
    sc.pl.umap(adata, color=markers, title=title)
```

```{python}
sc.tl.louvain(adata)
```

```{python}
cd8a = markers_ensg.loc[markers_ensg["gene_symbol"] == "CD4",:]["ensg"].values

adata.obs["cd8"] = np.log(adata.raw[:, cd8a[0]].X + 1)
```
